attributes.action: ensure that wherever pornographic material is sold openly to the public it is not on display under a certain height (6' or so) so that children are easily exposed to it at a lower level - eg at petrol stations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to introduce or enforce legislation to ensure that our children are not easily exposed to pornographic material in public places.  For example, in a petrol station, these magazines should either be on a high rack or should have their front covers obscured with a blank page.  Our children, and many of us ourselves, are unnecessarily confronted and offended by such adult material.
